creator: DesignNight
title: Urban Maps
description: This project involves creating a stenciled map illustrating the different modes of transportation people use to arrive at a specific location. Participants mark on the map where they came from using different colored keys to represent various transportation methods.
steps: Obtain a stenciled map of the city. This can be purchased online or 3D/2D printed.
Spray paint the map onto a whiteboard or wall.
Create a key using at least 4 different colors to represent different modes of transportation.
Allow people to mark on the map the places they came from, using the appropriate color from the key to indicate their mode of transportation.
Observe the completed map showing the origins and transportation methods of the participants.
